blog.source: Horizon brings Web3 accessibility to the masses by empowering its users through unprecedented security and the ability to own and lease their data at will with just a few clicks. ### Effortless Switch Users can quickly import bookmarks, extensions, and saved passwords into Horizon. Bringing all the best of your old browser, to a better, faster and safer alternative. ### Dataconomy As the digital world prepares for a paradigm shift in how we view data and privacy online, Horizon aims to be the gateway for everyday users to enter the dataconomy and reap the full benefits of a decentralised web where data harvesting, intrusive cookies and other such practises are all thing of the past. Instead Horizon offers actionable intelligence that respects consumer privacy, provides revenue streams, and makes Web3 accessible to all.
blog.name: Horizon Browser
blog.title: A Next-Gen browser that offers unmatched privacy & access to the dataconomy.
blog.meta_title: Next-Gen browser that allows you to sell your data securely while preserving your privacy.
blog.description: The purpose-built Horizon desktop & mobile browser is 5 times faster than Chrome & allows its users to own and lease their data securely.
blog.meta_description: How Yasser leveraged Supabase to build Chatbase and became one of the most successful single-founder AI products.
blog.author: copple
